meanings.definition: To determine or express the quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: She quantitates the number of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The scientist quantitates the volume of liquid in the beaker.
meanings.sent3: He quantitates the amount of time he spends on his phone each day.
meanings.sent4: The teacher quantitates the knowledge gained by her students.
meanings.sent5: The scale quantitates the weight of the object accurately.

meanings.definition: To measure or estimate the amount or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: The tailor quantitates the length of the fabric before cutting.
meanings.sent2: Doctors quantitate the level of cholesterol in the patient's blood.
meanings.sent3: The chef quantitates the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The survey quantitates the opinions of the participants.
meanings.sent5: The ruler quantitates the distance between two points on the map.
